description: This starts as your normal match the tiles to make a rectangle game. Try to make as many rectangles as you can in 3 minutes; no need to click 4 times, just select the two opposite corners of matching tiles to create the rectangle. Remember the bigger the rectangle the more points you get. Once you think you have this mastered; make the game harder by trying to match the colors with random faces or try to match faces with random colors. Enable the special tiles: bombs give you more points, timers add time, while skulls reduce your points. Remove learning mode and see if you can still find the matching tiles. Still think the game is easy? Have fun playing.
